column1: #Text=Aang 's image says : " You are the Avatar . "
#Text=Korra says : " I do n't know what that is . "
#Text=Roku 's image says : " In order to remember , you must regain your connection with your Avatar Spirit . "
#Text=Kyoshi 's image says : " If you do n't , darkness will engulf the world .
#Text=" Wan 's image says : " No , but I can help you find her .
#Text=My name is Wan , and I will show you how I became the first Avatar .
